title: Hour 2 - Richard Roeper and Darren Rovell (04-15-20)
itunes:title: Hour 2 - Richard Roeper and Darren Rovell (04-15-20)
description:
Richard Roeper has a review of the Last Dance documentary on the 1990's Chicago Bulls. Darren Rovell talks about the NFL not allowing draft picks to advertise for their own products. The NFL is saying only eat, drinks, or wear products from NFL sponsors.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
